detail_desc: Short dress in soft slub jersey made from a cotton and modal blend with a V-neck. Narrow elastication and a detachable tie belt at the waist, and short cap sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Unlined.
Running cap in woven fabric with a soft terry sweatband inside and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.

Long dress in patterned chiffon. Stand-up collar with concealed buttons at the back, an opening at the back and a concealed zip with a hook-and-eye fastener. Long, wide sleeves with pleats at the shoulders, a gathered seam that creates volume and movement and a seam above the tapered cuffs. Seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt with a high slit at the front. Shorter, V-neck underdress in a viscose weave that can be unbuttoned to remove.
Calf-length skirt in an airy Tencel™ lyocell and viscose weave with a high waist, concealed zip at the back and draping with a sewn-in wrapover at the front. Unlined.
Short dress in pattern-weave viscose in a relaxed fit with a round neck and buttons down the front. Gathered yoke front and back and long, wide sleeves with narrow buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a kangaroo pocket, jersey-lined hood with a decorative drawstring, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Trainers in scuba fabric with lacing at the front. Mesh insoles and ethylene-vinyl acetate (EVA) and rubber soles.
Short, A-line dress in pleated chiffon with a V-neck and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Lined.

ANNA GLOVER x H&M. Short, sleeveless V-neck dress in an airy jacquard weave containing glittery threads. Flounces at the front that continue over the shoulders, a gathered section under the bust, concealed zip and button at the back, and a seam at the waist with a flared skirt. Satin lining.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with wide elastication and a drawstring at the waist and side pockets.
Scarf in an airy, patterned weave with fringes along the sides. Size 150x200 cm.

Running top in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with a stand-up collar, zip and earphone outlet at the top, long raglan sleeves with ventilating mesh sections and thumbholes at the cuffs, and reflective details. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.
Metal hair clip with a glittery cobweb and spider on the top and hair extensions. Length approx. 34 cm.
Baby Exclusive. Trousers in a soft, textured organic cotton knit with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with wide elastication and a drawstring at the waist and side pockets.
Baby Exclusive. Bootees in an organic cotton knit.

Rain jacket in wind- and waterproof functional fabric with press-studs down the front, closed waterproof seams and a detachable, fleece-lined hood with a peak. Fleece lining. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Trousers in soft sweatshirt fabric with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, appliqués on the front, and tapered legs with ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Jumper in a soft, fluffy jacquard knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with a wrapover front and press-studs at the side and crotch.
Calf-length lace dress with a V-neck and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Seam and concealed zip at the waist, and a flared skirt. Lined.

Straight-cut coat in a sturdy, textured weave with notch lapels and a concealed double-breasted fastening at the front. Concealed side pockets, a detachable belt with a metal buckle at the waist, and a single back vent. Lined.
Short balloon-shaped skirt in a rustling weave with a drawstring at the waist and a rounded, elasticated hem. Jersey lining.
Aviator-style sunglasses with metal frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Top in a viscose crêpe blend with lace trims. Narrow shoulder straps, V-neck at the front and short slits in the sides.
Hipster briefs in microfibre with lace trims, a low waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
Long-sleeved top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a print motif, jersey-lined hood and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Three-strand thin metal chain necklace with different pendants. Adjustable length, 40-48.5 cm.
Batik-patterned swim shorts in woven fabric made from recycled polyester with an elasticated, drawstring waist and fake fly. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Over-the-knee socks in a soft, fine knit containing some wool.
Top in soft, airy slub jersey with a V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the front and long sleeves with ribbing at the cuffs. Elasticated seam at the waist and a peplum.
Jacket in soft pile with a collar, concealed press-studs down the front, patch pockets, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Lined.
Loose-fitting sports vest top in soft, fast-drying functional fabric. Slightly longer at the back.
Block-coloured top in sweatshirt fabric with a text print on the front, a stand-up collar, zip at the top and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Zip-through hoodie in lightweight sweatshirt fabric. Jersey lined, printed hood with ear appliqués, a zip down the front with a chin guard, and patch front pockets in the shape of paws with a print. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Dungarees in stretch denim with adjustable straps with metal buckles and a two-part chest pocket, front and back pockets, a zip in the side, fake fly and tapered legs.
V-neck jumper in fine-knit cotton with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Leggings in jersey with a sheen. High waist with wide elastication.
Sleeveless dress in slub cotton jersey with woven broderie anglaise flounces down the front that continue over the shoulders, a gathered seam at the hips and a flared skirt.
Trainers in imitation leather with lacing at the front, mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.

Long kaftan in a crinkled weave with a slight sheen. V-neck and gathered seams under the bust and at the back to create a gentle draping effect. Short, wide sleeves that are open at the top, and a rounded hem. Lined.
Slim-fit trousers in stretch twill with a regular waist, zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and lacing down the legs.
Straight-cut jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, welt front pockets with a flap, and no fasteners. Lined.
Small bag with a narrow shoulder strap and a zip at the top. Lined. Size 16x22 cm.
Double-layered jersey top in a cotton blend with hard-worn details, raw edge cuffs and a raw-edge, rounded hem.
Short-sleeved tops in soft jersey with gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy. The cotton content of the tops is organic.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with hard-worn details, a regular waist and zip fly and button. Tapered legs with raw-edge hems.

Suit trousers in a linen weave with an extended waistband and concealed hook-and-eye fastening. Side pockets, jetted back pockets and legs with creases. Slim fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Straight jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a stand-up collar, low dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves.
Jacket in a crêpe weave with notch lapels, welt front pockets and 3/4-length sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a decorative metal button at the cuffs. No fasteners. Lined.
Satin top in a relaxed fit with a lace section at the top and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.

Calf-length dress in a patterned viscose weave with a small stand-up collar, V-neck opening at the front, 3/4-length sleeves and narrow cuffs with a covered button. Seam at the waist with a drawstring, and a seam at the hem for added width. Unlined.
Flared skirt in jersey with a raised pattern. Elasticated waist, seam at the hips and a wide flounced hem. Unlined.
Short jersey top with a round neckline, short sleeves and an open back with ties at the hem.
Short top in jersey made from a viscose blend with ribbing and a decorative knot at the hem.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Multi-functional top in stretch, fine-knit viscose. Visible buttons at the waist that can be unfastened to remove the lower section and transform the top to a cropped top. Fitted style with a low neckline, narrow shoulder straps and a racer back.
Fitted top in stretch, glossy jersey with spaghetti shoulder straps and a double layer at the top.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.

Short dress in woven fabric with a square neckline and smocked bodice. Short puff sleeves with narrow elastication over the shoulders and at the hems. Seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Shirt in soft cotton piqué with a collar, buttons down the front, yoke at the back and buttoned cuffs.
Trousers in soft organic cotton jersey with feet and foldover ribbing at the waist.
Long-sleeved top in soft mesh with a round neck and extra-long, gathered sleeves.
Wide, slightly shorter jumper in a textured cotton knit with dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short, pleated skirt in woven fabric. High waist with covered elastication, and an overlocked hem.
Biker jacket in soft imitation leather with a collar and shoulder tabs with decorative press-studs. Diagonal zip down the front and zipped front pockets. Lined.
Wide blouse in a patterned weave with a small stand-up collar, opening with a button at the back of the neck, a yoke at the front and long sleeves.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with appliqués on the front, low dropped shoulders, wide sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
T-shirt in UV-protective fabric with a print motif on the front, a stand-up collar and short raglan sleeves. Slightly longer at the back. UPF 50.
Short kimono in patterned satin with frill trims around the sleeves and hem and a detachable tie belt at the waist.
Polo shirt in premium cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket, short sleeves with ribbed trims, and short slits in the sides.
Long-sleeved top in soft jersey with a flounce at the front that continues along the sleeves.
Slim-fit trousers in stretch cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
Long-sleeved nursing top in soft jersey sewn in a double layer with openings in the lower layer for easier nursing access.
Fine-knit tights with an elasticated waist.
Blouse in a patterned viscose crêpe weave with a slightly wider neckline and long, cuffed sleeves. Unlined.
Blouse in a crêpe weave with plastic pearly beads around the neckline and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Elasticated seam under the bust and 3/4-length trumpet sleeves. Unlined.

Bikers in jersey with a firm shaping effect on the tummy and thighs and a push-up effect on the bum. High waist and a lined gusset. The bikers are designed with the minimum number of seams for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin.
Shirt in an Oxford cotton weave with a button-down collar, chest pocket and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Ankle-length jeans in washed stretch twill with a high waist, zip fly and button, back pockets and skinny legs with stripes down the sides.
